The Movember Foundation

Previous Updates

Showing
Matthew Polick posted a photo on Pivotal - New York City's page
1 day(s) ago

I am very encouraged that every conversation that we have about my awesome stash, gives me ample opportunity to educate my friends and family. As a person that likes attention, I can now ask you to join in on our campaign for Men's Health. Just one life saved is worth a life time of creeper stashes. Have an awesome (for some of us - a very cold) weekend. Thanks for your support.

Matthew Polick posted a photo on Pivotal - New York City's page
1 Week(s) Ago

Mandi is not very happy with my new look. She has found a whole new list of excuses as to why she doesn't want to be seen with me. Can you blame her? (I may need to raise a separate fund for hotel stays as the month progresses, #NYCdoghouse) Thank you to my friends and family that have donated.
